verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Now you shall see<WH7200> what I will do<WH6213> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> for by a strong<WH2389> hand<WH3027> he shall let them go,<WH7971> and by a strong<WH2389> hand<WH3027> he shall drive them out<WH1644> of his land.<WH776>"
God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> and said<WH559> to him,<WH3068> "I am Yahweh;
and I appeared<WH7200> to Abraham,<WH85> to Isaac,<WH3327> and to Jacob,<WH3290> as God<WH410> Almighty;<WH7706> but by my name<WH8034> Yahweh<WH3068> I was not known to them.<WH3045>
I have also established<WH6965> my covenant<WH1285> with them,<WH5414> to give them the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> the land<WH776> of their travels,<WH4033> in which they lived as aliens.<WH1481>

Moreover I have heard<WH8085> the groaning<WH5009> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> whom<WH834> the Egyptians<WH4714> keep in bondage,<WH5647> and I have remembered<WH2142> my covenant.<WH1285>

Therefore<WH3651> tell<WH559> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> <WH3068> 'I am Yahweh, and I will bring<WH3318> you out from under the burdens<WH5450> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and I will rid<WH5337> you out of their bondage,<WH5656> and I will redeem<WH1350> you with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> and with great<WH1419> judgments:<WH8201>

and I will take<WH3947> you to me for a people,<WH5971> and I will be to you a God;<WH430> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brings<WH3318> you out from under the burdens<WH5450> of the Egyptians.<WH4714>

I will bring<WH935> you into the land<WH776> which I swore<WH5375> to give<WH5414> to Abraham,<WH85> to Isaac,<WH3327> and to Jacob;<WH3290> and I will give<WH5414> it to you for a heritage:<WH4181> I am Yahweh.<WH3068>'"
Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> so to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> but they didn't<WH8085> listen to Moses<WH4872> for anguish<WH7115> of spirit,<WH7307> and for cruel<WH7186> bondage.<WH5656>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Go<WH935> in,<WH1696> speak to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> that he let the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go out<WH7971> of his land.<WH776>"

Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> "Behold,<WH1121> the children of Israel<WH3478> haven't<WH8085> listened to me.<WH6547> How then shall Pharaoh listen<WH8085> to me,<WH589> who am of uncircumcised<WH6189> lips?<WH8193>"

Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> and gave them a command<WH6680> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> to bring<WH3318> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

These are the heads<WH7218> of their fathers<WH1>' houses.<WH1004> The sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> the firstborn<WH1060> of Israel:<WH3478> Hanoch,<WH2585> and Pallu,<WH6396> Hezron,<WH2696> and Carmi;<WH3756> these are the families<WH4940> of Reuben.<WH7205>

The sons<WH1121> of Simeon:<WH8095> Jemuel,<WH3223> and Jamin,<WH3226> and Ohad,<WH161> and Jachin,<WH3199> and Zohar,<WH6714> and Shaul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of a Canaanite woman;<WH3669> these are the families<WH4940> of Simeon.<WH8095>

These are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> according to their generations:<WH8435> Gershon,<WH1648> and Kohath,<WH6955> and Merari;<WH4847> and the years<WH8141> of the life<WH2416> of Levi<WH3878> were one hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> - seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>
The sons<WH1121> of Gershon:<WH1648> Libni<WH3845> and Shimei,<WH8096> according to their families.<WH4940>

The sons<WH1121> of Kohath:<WH6955> Amram,<WH6019> and Izhar,<WH3324> and Hebron,<WH2275> and Uzziel;<WH5816> and the years<WH8141> of the life<WH2416> of Kohath<WH6955> were one hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> - three<WH7969> years.<WH8141>
The sons<WH1121> of Merari:<WH4847> Mahli<WH4249> and Mushi.<WH4187> These are the families<WH4940> of the Levites<WH3878> according to their generations.<WH8435>

Amram<WH6019> took<WH3947> Jochebed<WH3115> his father<WH1733>'s sister to himself as wife;<WH802> and she bore<WH3205> him Aaron<WH175> and Moses:<WH4872> and the years<WH8141> of the life<WH2416> of Amram<WH6019> were a hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> - seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>
The sons<WH1121> of Izhar:<WH3324> Korah,<WH7141> and Nepheg,<WH5298> and Zichri.<WH2147>
The sons<WH1121> of Uzziel:<WH5816> Mishael,<WH4332> and Elzaphan,<WH469> and Sithri.<WH5644>

Aaron<WH175> took<WH3947> Elisheba,<WH472> the daughter<WH1323> of Amminadab,<WH5992> the sister<WH269> of Nahshon,<WH5177> as his wife;<WH802> and she bore<WH3205> him Nadab<WH5070> and Abihu,<WH30> Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar.<WH385>
The sons<WH1121> of Korah:<WH7141> Assir,<WH617> and Elkanah,<WH511> and Abiasaph;<WH23> these are the families<WH4940> of the Korahites.<WH7145>

Eleazar<WH499> Aaron<WH175>'s son<WH1121> took<WH3947> one of the daughters<WH1323> of Putiel<WH6317> as his wife;<WH802> and she bore<WH3205> him Phinehas.<WH6372> These are the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' houses of the Levites<WH3881> according to their families.<WH4940>

These<WH1931> are that Aaron<WH175> and Moses,<WH4872> to whom<WH834> Yahweh<WH3068> said,<WH559> "Bring out<WH3318> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> according to their armies.<WH6635>"

These<WH1992> are those who spoke<WH1696> to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> to bring out<WH3318> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from Egypt.<WH4714> These are that Moses<WH4872> and Aaron.<WH175>
It happened on the day<WH3117> when Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714>
that Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> "I am Yahweh.<WH3068> Speak<WH1696> to Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> all that I speak to you.<WH1696>"
Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH6189> I am of uncircumcised lips,<WH8193> and how shall Pharaoh<WH6547> listen to me?<WH8085>"
